text:
e="preserve">Claude Bolling (10 April 1930 – 29 December 2020) was a French jazz pianist, composer, arranger, and actor. He was born in Cannes, France. He was known as the composer of the "Lucky Luke" animated movies "Daisy Town" (1971) and "La Ballade des Dalton" (1978).
Bolling died on 29 December 2020 in Saint-Cloud, France at the age of 90.
